price: 10. "I said (to them): ‘Ask forgiveness from your Lord, verily, He is Oft-Forgiving;
arabic: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: faqul'tu is'taghfirū rabbakum innahu kāna ghaffāran
